subject: PE Today: Judge Larry And Host Rosie
body:
CBSNews.com












Get 
      Ready For Judge Larry The good news? It appears Judge Larry 
      Seidlin is not coming to the "Early Show." The bad news? Seidlin has 
      reportedly signed with CBS Television Distribution. So while he may not be 
      becoming a member of the nuclear family of the news division, it looks 
      like Seidlin is still going to earn 'relative' status. [+ Read More]

Say 
      No To RoBob Barker had his farewell show last week and the 
      big discussion of the last month has been Who Will Fill His Shoes? 
      Actually, it hasn’t been ‘who will fill his shoes’ as much as it’s been 
      ‘Will Rosie O’Donnell Succeed Him?” immediately followed by a gasp of fear 
      and/or exultation, depending on who you’re talking to.[+ Read More]

A 
      Fashion FatwaDo some mediocre soft journalism in America, 
      and the worst you have to worry about is a takedown of your work in a 
      highbrow online magazine. Do the same in Pakistan, and you could be facing 
      a fatwa. [+ Read More]
